popup_title.message: Diddily-ho, click below and re-click the extension when you've arrived at Varusteleka name tag page!

sidepanel_item0.message: Click open the name tag variety that you want to add to your cart in the Varusteleka-website

sidepanel_item1.message: Add the names that you want a tag of to the list below

sidepanel_item2.message: By clicking the save button you get a new field to add a new name to

sidepanel_item3.message: To add the names to your shopping cart, press the big red "LAUNCH"-button below

sidepanel_item4.message: Now the names that you've added to your list will be in your shopping cart.
